prog: (PARI) LIM = prime(80)^2; v = vector(400); count = 0; forprime (p = 2, prime(80), x = 2; while (p^x <= LIM, count++; v[count] = p^x; x = nextprime(x + 1))); v = vecsort(vector(count, i, v[i])); A = vector(count); for (i = 1, count, f = factor(v[i]); A[i] = f[1, 1]); A - _David Wasserman_, Feb 17 2006
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Mar 28 2000
